description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Push your reflex's to the limit as you work your way through 8 countries to complete the World Tour. Humiliate your friends locally or over xbox live with your talent. Kick it up a level as you take on the world and leave your mark on Super Tricky's Global Scoreboard. You could become the greatest player of all time.
